level.heading: See Forever Foundation - Evans Campus.
level.text: The Department shall have the authority to direct and manage the modernization or new construction of the See Forever Foundation - Evans Campus, as authorized funds become available.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 1011 of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-21
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under ยง 10-551.01
